testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #1
For two fields following each other one is not a continuation of the other (they differ more than in two places).
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
--------- | _ _ _ | | _ _ _ | | _ _ _ | --------- Enter the coordinates: > 2 2 --------- | _ _ _ | | _ X _ | | _ _ _ | --------- Enter the coordinates: > 2 1 --------- | _ _ _ | | O X _ | | _ _ _ | --------- Enter the coordinates: > 3 1 --------- | _ _ _ | | O X _ | | X _ _ | --------- Enter the coordinates: > 2 2 --------- | _ _ _ | | O O _ | | X _ _ | --------- Enter the coordinates: > 2 3 --------- | _ _ _ | | O O O | | X _ _ | --------- O wins
